snippet: On the PGA Tour, Jason Dufner, who was tied for the lead after two rounds of the Masters, ranks in the top 30 in scoring average in the first and second rounds, and outside the top 75 in the third and fourth.
abstract: On the PGA Tour, Jason Dufner, who was tied for the lead after two rounds of the Masters, ranks in the top 30 in scoring average in the first and second rounds, and outside the top 75 in the third and fourth.

headline.main: Looking for Four Good Rounds in a Row
